snippet: Citing a variety of reasons, the N.F.L. players union is seeking to void Roger Goodell’s suspensions of four players linked to the Saints’ bounty program.
abstract: NFL players union files grievance seeking to void NFL commissioner Roger Goodell's suspensions of four players linked the the New York Saints bounty program.
lead_paragraph: Citing a variety of reasons, the N.F.L. players union is seeking to void Roger Goodell’s suspensions of four players linked to the Saints’ bounty program.

headline.seo: Union Files Grievance for Suspended N.F.L. Players
headline.main: Union Files Grievance Over Bounty Suspensions
headline.print_headline: Union Files Grievance Over Bounty Suspensions
